import React from "react"; import AboutPic from "../../images/portfolio2min.png"; import "./about.css"; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I'm a creative and analytical individual with a balanced brain approach to web development. I view it as the ultimate challenge, where art meets problem solving, and I thrive on finding elegant solutions to the complex problems.

); }; export default About;
